publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2649 Cathy Jamieson: Adoption and Children Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament accepts the need for Scotland, along with England and Wales, to participate in the Adoption and Children Act Register to be established by the Adoption and Children Bill and agrees that the relevant provisions to achieve this end in the Bill should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*, Patricia Ferguson*
